description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中国共产党党员。现任北京市丰台区方庄社区卫生服务中心主任、首都医科大学教授。曾为第十三届全国政协委员，享受国务院政府特殊津贴。
description.en: Chinese politician and a member of the Communist Party of China. He is the current director of the Fangzhuang Community Health Service Center in Fengtai District, Beijing, and a professor at Capital Medical University. He was a member of the 13th National Committee of the CPPCC and is an expert who enjoys the special government allowances of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国政协委员

zh-cn: 第十三届全国政协委员
en: Member of the 13th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会的组成人员。
description.en: Members of the 13th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 位于安徽省芜湖市的一所省属普通高等医学专科院校。
description.en: A provincial public medical college located in Wuhu, Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: An Australian public research university.

nodes.id: 北京市丰台区方庄社区卫生服务中心

zh-cn: 北京市丰台区方庄社区卫生服务中心
方庄社区卫生服务中心
en: Fangzhuang Community Health Service Center, Fengtai District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 位于北京市丰台区的社区卫生服务机构。
description.en: A community health service institution located in Fengtai District, Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京市的一所公立医科大学。
description.en: A public medical university in Beijing.

en: Special government allowances of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院对于高层次专业技术人才和高技能人才的一种奖励制度，享受此津贴的专家被称为享受国务院政府特殊津贴专家。
description.en: A reward system of the State Council of the People's Republic of China for high-level professional and technical personnel and highly skilled personnel. Experts who receive this allowance are known as experts enjoying the special government allowances of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国中医药科技工作者和管理工作者及相关单位自愿结成的全国性、学术性、非营利性法人社会团体。
description.en: A national, academic, non-profit corporate social organization voluntarily formed by TCM science and technology workers, management personnel, and related units in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国医师行业的最高奖项。
description.en: The highest award in the Chinese physician industry.

description.zh-cn: 由执业医师、执业助理医师及单位会员自愿组成的全国性、行业性、非营利性社会团体。
description.en: A national, professional, non-profit social organization voluntarily formed by licensed physicians, licensed assistant physicians, and institutional members.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆医学科技工作者自愿组成并依法登记的学术性、非营利性社会组织。
description.en: An academic, non-profit social organization voluntarily formed and legally registered by medical science and technology workers in mainland China.

en: China Medical and Pharmaceutical Education Association

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家一级协会。
description.en: A national first-level association in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 吴浩是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Wu Hao is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国政协委员

description.zh-cn: 吴浩是第十三届全国政协委员。
description.en: Wu Hao was a member of the 13th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 1997年毕业于皖南医学院临床医学专业。
description.en: Graduated from Wannan Medical College in 1997 with a major in clinical medicine.

degree.zh-cn: 公共卫生管理专业硕士

description.zh-cn: 2013年毕业于拉筹伯大学健康与科学学院获公共卫生管理专业硕士学位。
description.en: Graduated from the School of Health and Science at La Trobe University in 2013 with a Master's degree in Public Health Management.

relationships.target: 北京市丰台区方庄社区卫生服务中心

description.zh-cn: 吴浩现任北京市丰台区方庄社区卫生服务中心主任、主任医师。
description.en: Wu Hao is the current director and chief physician of the Fangzhuang Community Health Service Center in Fengtai District, Beijing.

position.zh-cn: 第一临床学系教授、硕士研究生导师
position.en: Professor and Master's Supervisor of the First Clinical Department

description.zh-cn: 吴浩是首都医科大学第一临床学系教授、硕士研究生导师。
description.en: Wu Hao is a professor and master's supervisor in the First Clinical Department of Capital Medical University.

description.zh-cn: 吴浩是享受国务院政府特殊津贴专家。
description.en: Wu Hao is an expert who enjoys the special government allowances of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 吴浩曾获中华中医药学会科技进步三等奖1项。
description.en: Wu Hao once won a third prize for scientific and technological progress from the China Association of Chinese Medicine.

description.zh-cn: 2018年，吴浩荣获“中国医师奖”荣誉称号。
description.en: In 2018, Wu Hao was honored with the 'Chinese Physician Award'.

position.zh-cn: 全科医师分会副会长、全科医生教育培训专家委员会委员
position.en: Vice President of the General Practitioners Branch, Member of the General Practitioner Education and Training Expert Committee

description.zh-cn: 吴浩担任中国医师协会全科医师分会副会长、中国医师协会全科医生教育培训专家委员会委员。
description.en: Wu Hao serves as the Vice President of the General Practitioners Branch and a member of the General Practitioner Education and Training Expert Committee of the Chinese Medical Doctor Association.

position.en: Standing Committee Member of the General Practice Branch

description.zh-cn: 吴浩担任中华医学会全科分会常务委员。
description.en: Wu Hao serves as a standing committee member of the General Practice Branch of the Chinese Medical Association.

position.zh-cn: 全科医学分会副主任委员
position.en: Vice Chairman of the General Practice Medicine Branch

description.zh-cn: 吴浩担任中华中医药学会全科医学分会副主任委员。
description.en: Wu Hao serves as the Vice Chairman of the General Practice Medicine Branch of the China Association of Chinese Medicine.

position.zh-cn: 基层医药教育工作委员会副主任委员
position.en: Vice Chairman of the Grassroots Medical Education Working Committee

description.zh-cn: 吴浩担任中国医药教育协会基层医药教育工作委员会副主任委员。
description.en: Wu Hao serves as the Vice Chairman of the Grassroots Medical Education Working Committee of the China Medical and Pharmaceutical Education Association.
